page.title: 06Housing South of Oakley - M3
page.content:
Apart from Breach Farm, Bull's Bushes Farm, Southwood Farm and Oakdown Farm there are only{two areas which are {primarily residential.}These are the South Oakley/Pardown area and the new privately owned, estate developments on the western edge of Kempshott.
The{Kempshott houses}are of a conventional brick built construction. They are mainly detached and semi- detached with only a few terraced. The present{price of these properties ranges from Â£32,000 to Â£85,000 for the larger four bedroomed homes.
Most houses have a{small garden}with a patio, and adjacent{garage,}which is occasionally integral. Utility rooms and conservatories have been added to some houses.
